translation:
Friend Quincoze

I need 158$880 to settle an account, and only you can get me out of this quagmire: get it and send it to me, as I am only waiting for that money to leave, etc., etc.

Almeida Piratini, October 21, 1838.

I handed the required amount to your orderly. It was as above. Quincoze
